personal_info.professional_summary: Over 20 years of professional experience in IT architecture, analysis, development, and support of batch and multi-tier applications. Diverse technical background in development, testing, administration, performance management, CA APM, UNIX, C, C++, C#, Java, and scripting languages. Comfortable in team or individual assignments.
